definition: friendly and open and willing to talk
details:
adjective
- friendly and open and willing to talk
= example: friendly and open and willing to talk
= synonyms: talkative
- marked by exaggerated feelings of euphoria and delusions of grandeur
- able or tending to expand or characterized by expansion
- of behavior that is impressive and ambitious in scale or scope
= example: of behavior that is impressive and ambitious in scale or scope
= synonyms: heroic
